stimulusHtml: Which country has an absolute advantage in sugar production?

features.html: The table below shows the total labor hours required to produce a unit of gold and the total labor hours required to produce a unit of sugar in Portugal and Spain, respectively.

choicesHtml: Neither Spain nor Portugal, because both require fewer labor hours to produce a unit of gold than to produce a unit of sugar.
Spain, because the opportunity cost of sugar in terms of gold is lower.
Spain, because it requires fewer total labor hours than Portugal to produce a unit of sugar.
Portugal, because it requires more total labor hours than Spain to produce a unit of sugar.
Portugal, because it takes only a quarter of an hour to produce a unit of sugar.
